entry.title: WPP Server minor release: v1.5.0
entry.summary: Today we are releasing minor version v1.5.0 for WPP Server with Bug Fixes and Features.
entry.content:
Today we are releasing minor version v1.5.0 for WPP Server with Bug Fixes and Features.

Bug Fixes​

  • message: fix depercated sendFileFromBase64 (#812) (49d9152)
  • send file name on send-file-base64 and docs fix (3016f2f)

Features​

  • Added archive-all-chats-router (8c7d6fa)
  • Delete all chats close #483 (f47a253)

For more information, see the release page.

entry.title: WPPConnect patch release: v1.14.5
entry.summary: Today we are releasing a patch version v1.14.5 for WPPConnect with Bug Fixes and Features.
entry.content:
Today we are releasing a patch version v1.14.5 for WPPConnect with Bug Fixes and Features.

Bug Fixes​

  • Adding Missing Typing in GroupMetadata (30f1caa)
  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-version to ^1.1.104 (3e0a33d)
  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-version to ^1.1.98 (e342c41)
  • Fixed getAllGroups method (fix #1089, fix #1188) (4efb0cf)
  • Improved onAnyMessage for ciphertext messages (7eb9e59)
  • Improved onMessage event to re-trigger message after ciphertext (fix #1065) (b9ff808)
  • Improved onPresenceChanged event (d71835f)
  • typings: Adding Missing Typing in Chat (a6afdd1)
  • Updated @wppconnect/wa-js to v2.8.1 (fix #1196) (8ecaa6b)

Features​

  • Added poweredBy config for Google Analytics (b0883f3)
  • options for GA and linkPreviewApiServers (#1186) (4479f9b)

For more information, see the release page.

entry.title: WA-JS patch release: v2.8.1
entry.summary: Today we are releasing a patch version v2.8.1 for WA-JS with Bug Fixes and Features.
entry.content:
Today we are releasing a patch version v2.8.1 for WA-JS with Bug Fixes and Features.

Bug Fixes​

  • Fixed chat.live_location_update event when there are a current shared location (085a719)
  • Fixed chat.msg_ack_change event to ignore non my messages (78e5d49)
  • Fixed WPP.chat.markIsUnread function (wppconnect-team/wppconnect#1196) (db7195e)
  • Improved chat.presence_change event to use queueMicrotask (34dd0d6)
  • Update status v3 contacts before send (96fa79b)
  • Use non obstructive trigger for chat.new_message event (07316fb)

Features​

  • Trigger chat.new_message event for ciphertext msg after sync (3338cce)

For more information, see the release page.

entry.title: WPP Server minor release: v1.4.0
entry.summary: Today we are releasing minor version v1.4.0 for WPP Server with Bug Fixes and Features.
entry.content:
Today we are releasing minor version v1.4.0 for WPP Server with Bug Fixes and Features.

Bug Fixes​

  • Archive chat malforming and docs (1f6515b)
  • Change router to profile pic, similar lib (20c4945)
  • Change router to similar lib (9975575)
  • Correct path to download stickers (883c30e)
  • Mark unseen error (dc3acb9)
  • Remove unnecessary var (79fe09a)
  • Send buttons list sections (32f8207)

Features​

  • Socket emit on events (#795) (7f29c26)
  • Added reject call router
  • Send List Message

For more information, see the release page.

entry.title: WA-JS patch release: v2.7.2
entry.summary: Today we are releasing a patch version v2.7.2 for WA-JS with Bug Fixes and Features.
entry.content:
Today we are releasing a patch version v2.7.2 for WA-JS with Bug Fixes and Features.

Bug Fixes​

  • Fixed group creation when you have your own number in the list (4b76f5a)
  • Improved Google Analytics tracker (e51a542)
  • lint: sort imports (23fde0d)

Features​

  • add optional link preview servers via config (4f7ac41)
  • Usage Google Analytics optional, can set own GA track id (19079d7)

For more information, see the release page.

entry.title: WA-JS patch release: v2.7.1
entry.summary: Today we are releasing a patch version v2.7.1 for WA-JS with Bug Fixes, Features and BREAKING CHANGES.
entry.content:
Today we are releasing a patch version v2.7.1 for WA-JS with Bug Fixes, Features and BREAKING CHANGES.

Bug Fixes​

  • Fixed compatibility with WhatsApp Web >= 2.2222.8 (a1d994c)
  • Return undefined instead of throw an exception (817592b)

Features​

  • Added Google Analytics (946cc80)
  • Added WPP.call.rejectCall function (4461cb0)
  • Added WPP.catalog.getMyCatalog function (7922931)
  • Aded call.incoming_call event (e318902)

BREAKING CHANGES​

  • Now "not found module" will return undefined value instead of throw an exception

For more information, see the release page.

entry.title: WPPConnect minor release: v1.14.0
entry.summary: Today we are releasing minor version v1.14.0 for WPPConnect with Bug Fixes, Features and BREAKING CHANGES.
entry.content:
Today we are releasing minor version v1.14.0 for WPPConnect with Bug Fixes, Features and BREAKING CHANGES.

Bug Fixes​

  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-js to ^2.6.0 (27d5a52)
  • deps: update dependency @wppconnect/wa-version to ^1.1.89 (d65437d)
  • Fixed compatibility with WhatsApp WEB >= 2.2220.8 (1a96ab1)
  • Updated the WhatsApp version to 2.2220.X (8ad94be)
  • Updated User-Agend (2353013)

Features​

  • Automatic use tokens folder for browser session (f082612)
  • Full rework of sendFile to allow options (b1b712e)
  • Full rework of sendLocation to allow options (d9fb419)

BREAKING CHANGES​

  • Changed the sendLocation result
  • Changed the function result

For more information, see the release page.
